name: arian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person born during the period 21 March to 20 April, who is believed to be influenced by the zodiac sign Aries: She's an Arian. Three people in my family are Arians. See
Aries
More examplesFewer examplesAn Arian, he'll be 35 at the end of March.I'm an Aquarian and my husband is an Arian.

belonging or relating to the zodiac sign Aries (= the sign for people born from 21 March to20 April): Courage is a typical Arian trait. If you were born at the beginning of April, you are Arian.
More examplesFewer examplesI think it's a very Arian trait to want to be in control at a party and make sure everyone is enjoying themselves.

(a person who has) a connection with or belief in the stated subject: a librarian (= person who works in a library) a vegetarian (= a person who does not eat meat) humanitarian aid (= help for injured, ill, or hungry people)
